summary: An ordinance relating to the Engineering, Park and Water Departments; creating certain and abolishing other positions therein; fixing compensation and superseding Ordinance 85700 (1957 Salary Ordinance) and other ordinances in conflict; authorizing expenditures by the Engineering Department for easements and property acquisition for water, sewer and L.I.D. purposes; providing the funds by budget item transfers and appropriations and reimbursable appropriations from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
committee: Finance, Streets and Sewers and Personnel & Efficiency
